ai-patthana21.16:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.16:1.1_0: Not seeing, you should give up unwholesome things, not seeing the skillful quality, because of not seeing again and again.
ai-patthana21.16:2.1_0: Not seeing, they should give up the unskillful qualities that should be given up by not seeing, by seeing, and with a reason.
ai-patthana21.16:2.1_1: not seeing things you should give up unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.16:2.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana21.16:3.1_0: without seeing, without seeing, indicating, based on seeing, loving-kindness, and with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.16:3.1_1: not seeing things that should be given up by not seeing, inclusively, without seeing, causes and reasons.
ai-patthana21.16:3.1_2: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana21.16:3.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana21.16:4.1_0: you should not give up any unskillful qualities that should be given up by developing the skillful. You should not give up the cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.16:4.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:6.1_0: Not seeing the cause, skilled in seeing, or causes and conditions that are skillful.
ai-patthana21.16:6.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:8.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the cause or reason for the sake of developing the skillful. You should not give up the skillful teaching.
ai-patthana21.16:8.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:10.1_0: or unskillful thoughts are not a reason,
ai-patthana21.16:14.1_0: Not with those without rapture, skilled in calming happiness, and skilled in reckonings.
ai-patthana21.16:16.1_0: We shouldn’t give rise to joy in those without rapture.
ai-patthana21.16:16.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:18.1_0: Not finding happiness as a result, no skillful quality arises in him.
ai-patthana21.16:18.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:20.1_0: equanimity does not arise when it comes to equanimity, nor does a cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.16:20.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:22.1_0: Not doing any of these shame, unwholesome qualities, or skillful qualities arise.
ai-patthana21.16:22.1_1: Not doing the following good principles, having a wholesome quality, that is to say, a condition for the skillful,
ai-patthana21.16:22.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:24.1_0: Not in the formless or immoral mind, there is no cause or condition for the wholesome quality.
ai-patthana21.16:24.1_1: Not in the formless or immoral mind.
ai-patthana21.16:24.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:26.1_0: Not in the formless or immoral mind.
ai-patthana21.16:26.1_1: Not with the profitable results, not with the wholesome quality, nor by cause or by reason.
ai-patthana21.16:26.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:28.1_0: Not knowing the teachings, they don’t give rise to unskillful qualities, or are skillful.
ai-patthana21.16:28.1_1: Not knowing the teachings, new things are skillful, there is a cause of skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.16:28.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:30.1_0: Not giving up wholesome things, one doesn’t give rise to unprofitable things.
ai-patthana21.16:30.1_1: Not by means of the skillful qualities, those skillful qualities do not arise because of that.
ai-patthana21.16:30.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:32.1_0: or unskillful qualities are not a condition for the skillful,
ai-patthana21.16:32.1_1: or unskillful qualities arise because of an unwholesome mind.
ai-patthana21.16:32.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:34.1_1: Not is surely not skilled in teaching Dhamma, nor with cause and reasons.
ai-patthana21.16:34.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.16:36.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to a refuge for skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.16:37.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to a refuge for the teaching, or for the unskillful.
ai-patthana21.16:38.1_0: (They are) not incapable of the teaching, nor indeterminately causes and reasons.
ai-patthana21.16:38.1_1: Not incompetent states, reasons give rise to undeclared teaching.
ai-patthana21.16:38.1_2: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana21.16:38.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
